column4: Hi all. I have installed xmms, but it will not open. It is giving me a weird error when i try to launch it from a terminal. here is the info. http://www.pastebin.com/133458  Do you know what is going on?
something about linker inconsitencies?
lol, srry, im tired, i just installed libmikmod2 and it now works...guess i need to use my brain more often :P
ah, right, the old-bug-in-the-nvidia-drivers thing
now that i have installed libmikmod2...will it mess up my nvidia drivers?
no, it works around a bug in them
thats pretty weird...anyways, thanks!!!!
you're welcome
are you following the instrucions on wiki.ubuntu.com/BinaryDriverHowto?
just follow those instructions
then obviously it's internet connection is not setup correctly
ive been thru all the settings
it used to work?
yes
what did you change since it last worked?
is /etc/resolv.conf correct?
you can't ping a bridge
apt-cache search download manager
How come with the default theme, and with most others, text on websites is often the same as the forgrund colour? is ther ea way to fix this?
its in firefox, and it actually occurs on apps as well
doesn't oocur here
it was like that when i first booted

no, that's not how it works, sorry
